Action - Class in com.gej.input
A class representing an input action.

action(long) - Method in class com.gej.timer.GTimer

Action.State - Enum in com.gej.input
The state of this action
actionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.gej.core.GWindow
Called by the timer each second to update the window state, such as title, window size, resolution in full-screen state etc.,
active - Variable in class com.gej.timer.GTimer
The state of the timer
ACTUAL_STEPS_FOR_SECOND - Static variable in class com.gej.core.Global
The actual speed of the game in steps per second

addFrame(Image, int) - Method in class com.gej.graphics.Animation
Add an image as a frame of this animation with a specific duration.
addMap(MapInfo) - Static method in class com.gej.map.MapManager
Adds a new map next to the current map.
addObject(GObject) - Static method in class com.gej.map.Map

addObject(GObject) - Method in class com.gej.map.MapLayer

AngularGObject - Class in com.gej.object.types
A customized object to move along a direction specified by angle in degrees.
AngularGObject() - Constructor for class com.gej.object.types.AngularGObject
Constructs an object which is invisible
AngularGObject(float, float) - Constructor for class com.gej.object.types.AngularGObject

AngularGObject(Image, float, float) - Constructor for class com.gej.object.types.AngularGObject

AngularGObject(Animation, float, float) - Constructor for class com.gej.object.types.AngularGObject

AngularGObject(Animation) - Constructor for class com.gej.object.types.AngularGObject

AngularGObject(Image) - Constructor for class com.gej.object.types.AngularGObject
Constructs an object with an image object.
Animation - Class in com.gej.graphics
Contains a list of images and frame timing information to create an animation which is used by the GObject's.
Animation() - Constructor for class com.gej.graphics.Animation
This default constructor could be used to create an empty animation object.
Animation(Image[], int) - Constructor for class com.gej.graphics.Animation
This constructor is useful when you have same duration for every frame and could add frames from an image array.
asString() - Static method in class com.gej.map.Map
Returns the current map as a string.
